name: Judgement FPS (Demo)
description:
Hello, i have started developing this game a lot time ago, unfortunately in Ukraine currently a lot of electrical problems so development is really slow. I have to admit: I took A LOT of inspiration from Ultrakill, Doom and Devil Daggers, but i hope to make it an original game. If you want sound - turn it on in Escape menu. Music is rather being tested now. I know there are some bugs etc. but i am working hard to fix them. Any feedback would be extremely helpful. If you can, please support the project because I am investing a lot of my personal time in it and trying to get it on steam. Have a good time!

Movement:

WASD: Move
Shift: Dash
Cntrl: Slide
F: Punch
